Player History

Traded from Washington to Colorado on 3/2/2011 (Going to COL: SS J. Baez. Going to WSH: P D. Villacorta)...

Injured on 4/29/2016 with a Bruised Heel, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 5/16/2017, off Neil Broxton (SF)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/18/2017, off Cory Luebke (SF)...
Drove in 6 runs against Arizona on 6/5/2019...
Injured on 9/12/2019 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against Washington on 9/27/2019...
Traded from Colorado to Houston on 7/31/2022 (Going to COL: RF J. Upton, P N. Villar. Going to HOU: SS J. Baez, LF J. Moore Jr.)...
Injured on 8/23/2023 with a Pulled Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
